message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. I think it would be very valuable to you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $12,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I could meet you halfway. How about $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
